summary: Compliation of Skyrim wallpapers. All files are in 1920x1080 resolution.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=trebuchet ms , helvetica, sans-serif][img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/2838/4bng.png[/img]
[size=3][b]_____________________________________________________[/b][/size]

[img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/1527/3s0k.jpg[/img]

[size=3] [color=#add8e6][b]Compliation of [/b][/color][color=#ffd700][b]76[/b][/color][b][color=#add8e6] Skyrim wallpapers.

All the images are digitally edited in-game screenshots.

Resolution:[/color] [color=#ffd700]1920x1080.[/color][/b][/size]

[img]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/2372/wmqr.jpg[/img]

[size=5][color=#ffd700][b]CREDITS[/b][/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#add8e6][b]for all the textures, atmosphere, scenery, weapons, armors, characters etc. go to [/b][/color]
[color=#ffd700][b]Bethesda [/b][/color][color=#add8e6][b]and countless [/b][/color][color=#ffd700][b]mod authors[/b][/color][color=#add8e6][b].[/b][/color][/size]

[img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/5146/j8mw.jpg[/img]

[size=6][color=#ffd700][b]ENJOY![/b][/color][/size]

[size=3][b]_____________________________________________________[/b][/size]

[size=3][color=#dda0dd][i][b]Changelog:[/b][/i][/color]
 
[color=#add8e6]21.12.2013 - version 1.0, counting 35 wallpapers.
29.03.2014 - version 1.1, counting 46 wallpapers.
18.04.2014 - version 1.2, counting 62 wallpapers.
23.11.2014 - version 1.3, counting 76 wallpapers.
[/color][/size]

[img]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/157/bucr.jpg[/img]

[size=3][b]_____________________________________________________[/b][/size]
